layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x600 [border: (2px solid #FF0000)]
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (22,22) size 756x556
      LayoutTable {TABLE} at (0,0) size 756x556 [border: (1px outset #808080)]
        LayoutTableSection {TBODY} at (1,1) size 754x554
          LayoutTableRow {TR} at (0,2) size 754x550
            LayoutTableCell {TD} at (2,265) size 384x24 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 33x19
                text run at (2,2) width 33: "FOO"
            LayoutTableCell {TD} at (388,265) size 364x24 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=1 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 31x19
                text run at (2,2) width 31: "BAR"
